comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Maud Somerville Jaffray, ex-wife of Hollis Horatio Hunnewell (d. 1922), son of banker Horatio Hollis Hunnewell (1810-1902): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/H._H._Hunnewell She divorced Hunnewell Jr. in 1902 and married John S. Tooker in 1903. She was mother of two Hunnewell children, Louisa and Maud. She was six feet tall and noted in Newport society for being a fine athlete, engaging in baseball, fencing, and boxing and wrestling before she wed, and tennis, golf, and riding after she married.

comment.author: 26160592@N04
comment._content:
A beautiful woman with a big hat
... and with a crazy name :-)!

Lovely
